thread.title: Joanna - Carlisle
thread.title_full: Country House Outdoor reviewed by Joanna - Carlisle

author: Joanna - Carlisle
title: Joanna - Carlisle
text: It didn't matter to me that the boots didn't arrive the next day, however, that is why I have only given four stars as it said when I ordered that they would. Otherwise, perfect condition at the best price on the Internet, so I'm over the moon that they had my size. Just beware with Ariat sizing that a 40 is a 6.5 not a 7 as with most other brands!
